dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.text: Hello, I'm Alice! Welcome to our world.

dialogue.speaker: Bob
dialogue.text: Nice to meet you, Alice. What's the purpose of this meeting?

dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.text: We've received a message from an unknown sender. It seems we're in grave danger.

dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.text: We're not entirely sure yet. That's why we need to investigate further.
